name: ASTRAL BLOOM
description:
ASTRAL BLOOM is a 2D action-platformer game featuring simple and digestible gameplay. Play as the manifestation of a potential universe in a body called an Avatar, where only 1 out of billions of souls can control the Avatar at once.

Features Fast-Paced

Play through levels of varying difficulty with unique objectives while making sure not to run out of time.

Strategy

Choose your battles by planning your route on the Mission Map, the fastest path may not be the simplest...

Story

Completing Missions unlocks additional narrative chapters, allowing for more insight into the world of ASTRAL BLOOM.

Additional Info

ASTRAL BLOOM is a prototype/thesis created by Raven Powless. To see more information regarding ASTRAL BLOOM go here and please look forward to future blog updates, thank you!
